amendment.description: Page 653, strike line 14 and all that follows through line 19.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 78 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to strike Section 209 of Division E, which grants the Secretary of Homeland Security authority to reprogram or transfer funds for the purpose of detaining aliens prioritized for removal.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Torres amendment (A042) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Torres amendment (A042) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A042) offered by Mrs. Torres.
